CHAT.comment: Time is 26:32. Video tape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

MOT and Chi work together fairly well; initially , MOT watches Chi play but she becomes involved in the activity and the two work together on a variety of constructions. Scientific talk about the magnets or magnetic force is very limited and usually consists of a single utterance at a time.

u.a: EXP
MOT and EXP briefly discuss the camera and why it isn't working
video starts here
talks to others in the room (Chi's father and another child , perhaps)
pulls magnets that are stuck together on the table apart and spreads them out on the table
aft drops red plastic ball onto black base and pushes it with his finger; the ball moves around but sticks to base

g.ga: yellow wand or yellow checked triangle magnet

u.a: aft Mot hands yellow wand to Chi and he picks up yellow checked triangle magnet and attempts to stick it to yellow wand
falling magnets make it hard to hear the end of this utterance
picks up silver man from table and moves it toward black base
MOT has placed the silver man on a silver stick that is sticking off the black base; it stays for a second but then falls to the table
takes silver man and sticks it on the black base so that it is lying flat
picks up another silver man from the table and puts it flat on the black base
mumbled
silver stick which has moved and stuck to the side of black base
picks up horseshoe magnet from table
several magnets that are on the table (plastic balls , nuts , and a silver ball) have become stuck together in a line
picks up the ball at the end of the line; some of the other magnets remain stuck to it but others fall off and stay on the table
Chi's father talks in the background
Father , maybe
slides another magnet ball at black base
picks up one silver man and hands it to Chi; points to another on the table
places silver man on side of black base; puts other one on opposite side of black base
whining , voice of the silver man
takes men from sides of black base and puts them on top of it with the other two silver men
takes silver man from top of black base and puts him back on the side of it; pushes silver man with finger and it slides around the corner of the black base to the other side
attempts to pull two silver men off black base , then sticks them back on it
picks up plastic turtle and moves it up and down on top of black base
a silver stick is sticking off the black base and Mot and Chi have strung several washers and nuts onto the silver stick
Chi has taken off nuts and washers from the silver stick and has balanced another silver stick on the first so that the second silver stick is perpendicular to the black base
he places a nut on each end of the silver stick that is perpendicular to the black base
puts washers on both ends of silver stick
places another washer on one end of the silver stick
indicates the side that is up in the air rather than the one that has fallen toward the table
picks up silver stick with the nuts and washers on it
drops the silver stick; the nuts and washers stick to the black base
washer that has stuck to yellow wand
removes the washer from yellow wand
magnet that has stuck to yellow wand
silver men are stuck to yellow wand
moves yellow wand with silver men attached over black base until it sticks to the wand
points to a silver man that is standing upright on the black base
stacks silver men on top of one another on the black base
attempts to place silver ball on top of the stacked silver men; they fall over
places nut on black base so it is standing up; balances silver man on top of nut

g.ga: construction of silver men stacked on one another

u.a: construction of silver men
whispered
pulls a silver man off yellow wand; adds it to construction
aft construction falls
removes two silver men from black base
two silver men
rams the two silver men in his hand into one another
MOT
attemps to put silver circle on black base
MOT is moving silver men around on black base and so is blocking Chi
Chi has managed to place silver circle on black base; Mot is hloding silver men on top of the silver circle
moves things around on table looking for silver men; lifts up black base and peers underneath
aft pulls magnets off the bottom of black base that Chi is holding up
moves to put silver man onto new construction of silver men
stops Chi from placing his silver man on construction so she can place her silver man on it first
MOT places her silver man and then Chi puts his on top of the pyramid
picks up yellow wand and slowly moves it toward the pyramid of silver men on the black base
aft construction falls over
stands a silver man up on black base again
places another silver man upside down on black base
moves silver man who was on his head as if he is doing a cartwheel across the base
bef places a paper clip in the hands of a silver man
removes paper clip and replaces it with the nut
turns a silver man upside down on black base
one of the silver men falls over
uses yellow wand to move nut across black base and then to pick it up from table
MOT and Chi are erecting a new construction of silver men in which one man is stuck on the base and is holding a silver stick on top of which two more men are balanced
aft construction falls over
taps back of Chi's hands
repeatedly drops magnet ball onto the hands of the silver men but it falls down to the black base and sticks to it
drops penny onto black base
drops penny on other side of table
drops ball on table and it is pulled to the black base
MOT's hand is blocking whatever it is that she wants Chi to look at
adds a second silver man to the new construction he is setting up on the black base
places a silver man on a different part of the black base
places a silver man on the opposite side of the black base from the one that he had placed earlier
silver man
removes a silver man that he had placed on top of another silver man
takes a second nut and puts it on the silver men on the other side of the platform
this could be Mot
horseshoe magnet that Chi has just placed on the black base
removes the horseshoe magnet
